tool_description: Download any facebook profile picture (public, private or locked)
name: Facebook profiles picture downloader
title: Facebook profiles picture downloader

api_list.name: Download
api_list.description: To get the picture url, dimensions and an upscaled version (optional)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-profiles-picture-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/download"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-profiles-picture-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-profiles-picture-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/download"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-profiles-picture-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
